column4: Guys can you help me please? It keeps saying my external HDD is read only when I know it isn't. What do I do?
what filesystem on the hdd?
FAT32
your umask is wrong in the mount options
How do I sort it out?
ubotu gave you a link
Still no joy
what is your mount line?
Sorry about that my PC froze
There is nothing under mount point, mount settings and file system
paste your mount line in a pastebin. I asked you this before
that is  not the full line
That is all I have
that does nothing. try again
it's only options
Well what should I do?
paste the line that mounts it
That is all I have, everything else is blank
suit yourself then. HAND
What? So you're not going to help me?
either you give me the info I need or I cannot help you. bye
and the errors you ecnounter too if any
So what do I do? I don't even know if it's mounted properly
